name: Kung-Fu Master: Re-Creation
description:
This is a re-creation of the classic video game Kung-Fu Master, or Spartan X, designed by Takashi Nishiyama. 

Fight your way through five floors of the dojo as Thomas, and save the love of your life from the mysterious Mr. X. Become the Kung-Fu Master!

Use the arrow keys to move, and A/D to fight the minions. 

This game was created by Levi Kenley and Nathan Tyson for the College of Charleston's Computing in the Arts Program. Enjoy!
